name: Each
description: The lowest level of the item hierarchy intended or labeled for individual resale. Generally this is the consumer unit sold at check out or online.

name: Inner Pack
description: Each units may be packed into inner packs, which are then packed into a case. Most items do not have an inner pack

name: Case
description: A standard shipping unit that contains eaches (packaged either individually or grouped as an inner pack). All of the items in a case must have the same GTIN.

name: Mixed Case
description: Contains more than one type of each, and must contain more than one GTIN. The case can contain eaches or inner packs.

name: Pallet
description: A shipping unit that contains either cases, inner packs, or eaches. It must contain one GTIN regardless of the number of items in the grouping.

name: Mixed Pallet
description: A shipping unit that can contain any combination of cases, inner packs, and/or eaches and must contain more than one GTIN.
